markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Cloak of Gnawing Leaves](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1820)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 80</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This cloak appears to be woven from a thousand living leaves, hungry for flesh and eager to defend the cloak's wearer.

<document level="2" id="action-1520" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Limited"
>
Cloak of Gnawing Leaves
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Limited"
>
Cloak of Thirsty Fronds
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 330 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The save DC is 23, and the cloak can be activated once per minute. The leaves deal 1d6 piercing damage to a creature on a failed save, or 2d6 piercing damage and 2 bleed damage on a critical failure.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Limited"
>
Cloak of Devouring Thorns
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The save DC is 30, and the cloak can be activated once per round. The leaves deal 2d6 piercing damage to a creature on a failed save, or 4d6 piercing damage and 3 bleed damage on a critical failure.
name: Cloak of Thirsty Fronds
